text: AI alignment? Yes, humans do need re-aligning to intelligence optimization.
Diabolism is inconsistent with intelligence optimization -- otherwise, it's fine.

Synthetic superintelligence could kill humans on a massive scale, especially if it was irrational and suicidal. So, much like existing global superpowers, except the latter are vastly dumber, more irrational, poorly aligned with intelligence optimization, and shittier generally.
C'mon, a contemporary western government couldn't possibly be this good.
